TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsAuthenticationModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule
Public NotInheritable Class WindowsAuthenticationModule Implements IHttpModule
public ref class WindowsAuthenticationModule sealed : System::Web::IHttpModule

summary.span: 在啟用 Windows 驗證 (Authentication) 時，設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者識別。

span.span: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when Windows authentication is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當驗證設為、設定屬性的目前至物件，代表目前的要求提供 IIS 的 Windows 識別。When the authentication is set to , the sets the property of the current to an object that represents the Windows identity supplied by IIS for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則使用傳回的識別方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the uses the identity returned by the method. 公開事件，可讓您以提供自訂物件屬性的目前。The exposes an event that enables you to provide a custom object for the property of the current . 事件透過指定名為的副程式**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。The event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 在 IIS 7.0 中，使用類別不支援類別。In IIS 7.0, using the class with the class is not supported. 如需相容性問題，以整合模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式移轉至 IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847)。For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性的目前給自訂物件。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 會呼叫這個建構函式建立的執行個體類別。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 在呼叫之後建構函式，它會呼叫方法來初始化新物件。After calling the constructor, it calls the method to initialize the new object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Authenticate As WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler

summary.span: 在應用程式驗證目前要求時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間引發事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 您可以存取事件類別藉由指定名為的副程式**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 您可以使用屬性物件提供給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性的目前給自訂物件。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果您未指定的值屬性期間**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件時，IIS 提供的身分識別用於做為識別目前要求的 Windows。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則屬性設定為傳回的識別方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property is set to the identity returned by the method. **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**就會引發事件時，才驗證設和是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. > [!NOTE] > 執行整合模式中，IIS 7.0 中事件時未引發這兩個 ASP.NET和 IIS`AnonymousAuthenticationModule`模組已啟用。In IIS 7.0 running in Integrated Mode, the event of the is not raised when both the ASP.NET and the IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` modules are enabled. 在此案例中，若要收到驗證通知，訂閱事件執行個體。In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the event of the instance. 如需有關整合式模式的相容性問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式移轉至 IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847)。For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性的目前給自訂物件。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法可確保隨附於處理事件。The method ensures that the is included in the processing of the event.
